website_summaries.verdict: Smaller than average end table that features a lot of metal in the design.
pros: Includes a lower shelf made from metal that is both functional and striking looking
Attractive square table top layout that will fit in some small spaces
Features angle iron legs that will grab your attention
cons: Only 18 inches tall, so it may not work well in certain room layouts

customer_reviews.title: This table is well made and easy to assemble at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: This table is well made and easy to assemble at a great price point. Worth every penny. Our English bulldog really likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Goulet

customer_reviews.title: Quality overshadows the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I am that person who thinks about something for a while before just jumping in. When I finally decided on the look of a coffee table, I knew this was the one when I saw it. Extremely sturdy. Beautiful natural stain looking top. Shipping was fast and arrived unharmed. Easy assembly that can be done by one person. Still on the hunt for a couch and other pieces but this is a great start. Can’t beat the price either. Don’t be fooled by this inexpensive coffee table. Highly recommend this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!! Great for a modern industrial look!  Great product & great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this console table for my front entry foyer. Super duper fast shipping!! Product arrived earlier than anticipated! Table came well packaged and all items were intact. Extremely easy assembly! Instructions were easy to follow. Had it assembled in less than 15 min. Love the wood and metal look! Product is exactly what is described!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Looks like the pic. Very easy to assemble with hex key provided - no screw or thread problems. It needed to be straightened up with a t-square due to play in the holes in the uprights, before tightening up the screws - easily done. Sturdy enough with the screws firmly cinched. Board looks believably like reclaimed wood except for a little too much sheen which I’ll sand down very lightly. Since I’m decorating with items which fuse reclaimed/repurposed woods with high gloss black tech finishes, this is really close to perfect. The box was a little beat up but the item was well protected inside with styrofoam. Took about a week to ship.
customer_reviews.author: al tishal otiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Table That Wants To Be A Table. But Instead Functions As A Surfboard.
customer_reviews.text: According to the reviews this seems to happen often. My table showed up with two holes with no thread for the screws to grab onto for the legs to attach. So warning: it’s very possible this might happen to you.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars For Sure!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the coffee table first. I liked it so much, I came back and bought the end table! It is an awesome sturdy and durable little end table. Check the measurements, in case you are expecting a larger table. I put it together in minutes...and I am not handy. :) It is simple, yet beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coffee table and GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coffee table because the design looked beautiful. When the table arrived it was a damaged and I’ve got a little disappointed. When Songmics heard about my issue they reached me out shortly to solve the problem! Ive got a new table in perfect condition! Really happy with the table and overall custumer service! Really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka Fenley

customer_reviews.title: Sweet piece 'o' furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! VERY sturdy and nice looking! (No, the TV didn't come with it lol) Just put it on there for perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Vincess

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I love every piece I’ve gotten from Songmics! This table is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, not really "heavy duty" but should be fine
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, arrived undamaged. Looks nice, not really "heavy duty" but should be fine, frame is stronger and more durable than manufactured wood in any case. We'll see how the top holds up being particle board, maybe the lining on it will keep it safe from moisture, but I got the steel frame table so I could put a real wood top on it if I want or need to.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Good, but be careful with look of top
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good and sturdy item. My only issue was with the spaces between the wood top. On the original image of the item they look dark and nice. But the item I received has these light, discolored lines (as pictured), which are not aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Vianna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new TV
customer_reviews.text: Although not its stated purpose, I am using this for my new 43" TV. It fits nicely with my Craftsman decorating and into a small living room. I have the Blu-ray player and other stuff on the bottom shelf. I tested it first for a day by loading both shelves up with heavy objects, keeping in mind the stated weight limit. Pretty easy to assemble by myself
customer_reviews.author: Ontheroad

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Well built table for use in our office/den. Added an Urbanindustrialcraft set of Steampunk weathered wood bookends. Assembles well with two people. If you are alone, after the top and legs are attached snugly but NOT tight, gently turn the table on its side so you can use the weight of the bottom shelf to hold the shelf in place while you attach the bottom shelf screws snugly. Then gently right the table on a flat surface and finished tightening the screws firmly. Overall worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: nevadavet

customer_reviews.title: I love these two end tables
customer_reviews.text: I love these two end tables, great shipping and delivery, easy to assemble and the perfect item looking for my living room
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio1362

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've waited ten years to do my carpet over tiles and this table made the Finish perfect. Originally in the hall we had a bookcase with three shelves of shoes and honestly we only wear one pair of shoes a day so I was looking for something that would hold shoes on the bottom but give me the height to put my keys and maybe put a lamp on it when I saw the reviews of the other people who bought this I decided that helped me and hopefully this review will help you great table easy to install and very inexpensive compared to the home stores that I went to that were asking over $100 for fake wood tables.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Can't use
customer_reviews.text: Was putting it together tonight and when I put the ends on the legs, only 2 of them would tighten all the way and the other 2 would not because the threads on two of the leg end were not drilled out right. So instead of having a wobbly table which is rather short to be called an end table. The right threads on the legs would prob help the fact that it is so short. Pretty disappointed. I was pumped up to finally get this table put together after waiting a couple months for my new place to come available. Be nice if I was sent 4 new legs the had the bottoms threaded correctly.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than avg console tables
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the matching coffee table and fell in love. Decided to purchase the matching console table too. it is nice, no doubt. However, it is much smaller than then avg. console tables. That is my fault, should've double checked the sizes. It is a very small table. Only slightly higher than my standard height dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small end table.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to bring up a small NAS up off the floor. The grating on the bottom was perfect, as it allows airflow from below. Functionally, this is exactly what I wanted(although if it was a little bigger I wouldn't have minded, but not a con as it is). Assembly is easy as can be and the end table is sturdy. The quality is nice. Aesthetically, the piece looks really neat as well. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love it, exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome, I love it. It is great quality for the price. I put it together in 20 minutes by myself, totally easy assembly. Of course it is a faux finish, but it is very cool looking and I think it is done rather successfully. Bought it for my shop, can’t beat the style for the price. Came without damage in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This narrow table was exactly what I was looking for to hold my coffee machines and supplies in my kitchen. I put it together by myself in about ten minutes, and that was with me being careful. (I'm IKEA handy, but that's pretty much my level.) It comes with the Allen wrench you need to put it together. I recommend you assemble it on top of the open box because the top will scratch. Honestly, I like it better than I thought I would. Good value for the money. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Z42

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect - but dented
customer_reviews.text: We had been searching for the right table for our entry for a couple months. I had struggled to find something that worked with the furniture we already owned, as well as the dimensions for the space. Luckily, I stumbled upon this. The colors work with the black furniture we have, as well as the more natural looking wood. Sadly, once it was all assembled, the top had a large dent in it. We didn't want to break it down to send it back, so for now we are covering it up with a plant.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: A snap to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This table was what I needed to go near my computer for books, pamphlets and other small office items. No damage out of the box and is one of the most accurately drilled piece i have ever seen. Many times when items are predrilled you have to twist and pulled to get the holes lined up from one piece to the other. Not so with this. The screws even came with a thread locking solution on them to prevent the screws from backing out. I actually sat in a chair and was able to completely assemble the table. I have problems getting down on the floor and getting back up. More the latter!!
customer_reviews.author: Proud Veteran

customer_reviews.title: An attractive table that’s easily assembled and well engineered.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase from Vasagle, and will not be my last. Like the lamp I purchased, this product is attractive, easily assembled and well priced. I really want to call out the engineering put into this: intelligent packaging, clear instructions, and even small details you never see in this price range like threadlocker on the bolts used for the legs, and an Allen wrench included that can be used as a crank, allowing you to get the bolts in much quicker and easier. The individual components are the same type and material as you’ll find in most Chinese hardware, but the superior engineering gives you a stronger product in the end. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenu

customer_reviews.title: Mostly pros! Couple of cons!
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add- seller reached out to fix this issue and sent us a whole new table. the new table did not crack like the first one! I really struggled with this review, i love all of this furniture, we got the matching set and it could not look better in our house. It was easy to put together. Those are all the pros- now the two cons. First and foremost, keep the allen wrench provided. You will constantly have to tighten the screws! Second, there are four screws that attach the table top. Be SUPER careful not to screw them in too much. If the screw goes too far it will crack the table top!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & easily assembled!
customer_reviews.text: Love this console table! It went together easily in about 15 minutes, and it’s extremely sturdy. The holes all lined up perfectly. I love it so much, I may order another for my TV! The width, depth, and height are all perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Harris Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It’s perfect for my tiny space. Super easy to assemble and is quite sturdy. It’s turn what other reviews say about the gap in the wood being a different color and almost looking dirty but I don’t mind. All in all, I really like this table.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Be VERY careful
customer_reviews.text: Update: couldn’t be happier with customer service. They sent out a new table that got here two days earlier than they said and, being aware of the bolt issue this time, I now have a great coffee table. Very happy. Just be sure to use washers or only tighten the bolts for the table top enough to hold it in place without going through the surface. Old review: Mostly looks good and seems sturdy, but the bolts to attach the table top are too long and cracked through in four places. It would look great but the cracked spots from the bolts make it look like cheap crap in the one spot people see most.
customer_reviews.author: CLin

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: 2 month review: After putting this together, I noticed it was wobbly. A little while later, I set a glass down on the table and two screws fell out of the top where the tabletop connects to the metal. This was the part that was previously assembled. It's only in one corner but I am regretting this purchase because it affects the quality of the table as a whole. I cant set drinks down. I have the two screws scotch taped to the table so they don't fall out, even though they serve no real purpose. Redeeming quality is that it at least looks nice so 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Visually, I love it, but it isn't sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: When fully assembled and everything is tightened properly, the table has SIGNIFICANT wobble. Almost like it needs additional supports put in in some places. The bottom storage works great and stays firm, but the top (which really does look amazing, in person! I'm in no way knocking the tables appearance, or quality of materials) can shift a good amount, just by putting your feet up on it. I want to really love this.... but instead I'm settling for "not regretting buying it, but hoping I can jerry-rig a way to stabilize it."
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I wanted a small table for my front entry. I was able to assemble this table in less than 15 minutes. Only tools needed was an Allen wrench (it’s provided). For the cost, I’m a more than satisfied. This piece is very fitting in its place.
customer_reviews.author: Di GaWi

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will always arrive at least a little damaged
customer_reviews.text: This table would be nice except for the fact that it is complete garbage. The first one I ordered arrived with a good sized chip/imperfection in the surface. Amazon was great about sending out a replacement. However, after assembling the second one, I noticed several small blemishes. It wasn't worth it to me to send it back, since I got this on sale and I don't want to deal with the hassle of disassembling it. Learn from my mistake: don't buy this table!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I would absolutely recommend this sofa table. I docked one star because it’s not SUPER sturdy and I would recommend having another person present when building. I was able to make it work alone, but it became far more complicated than it needed to be! You have to level out the mesh shelf at the bottom and it’s nearly impossible on your own, unless you were to use a clamp to stabilize one side! With another person present assembly would have been a breeze. I also purchased the matching microwave stand and love both products.
customer_reviews.author: vdfan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: God I love this brand of tables so much. This was our third one. We wanted somewhere to set down bags besides the floor of our tiny living room. This is perfect. Fits nicely behind the couch. Sturdy enough that jumping cats don’t make it wobble at all. I was able to put it together alone in no time with very easy instructions. The height is perfect, the dimensions overall are perfect. The bottom shelf is awesome for gym bags, etc., that I don’t want on the floor but that we need easy access to all the time. If I had somewhere to put it, I would 100% buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Good design at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I'm a senior woman and I didn't need help. Very good looking. Industrial look -- a little masculine, strong looking. It goes great with my wine colored leather sofa. I didn't want wood because I am hard on furniture -- put my feet up and my coffee cup down. I doubt I could hurt the top, but I'm going to try. The "wood look" top is dark, just so you know. The metal undershelf is sturdy. I think I got great design at an amazingly cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: MJO

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the purchase of this end table! I was looking to do an affordable face lift to our living room area, and these worked perfectly. They were very easy to assemble, and shipped well with no damage to them. My husband was so skeptical of me purchasing such an inexpensive piece of furniture and he is even impressed! They are sturdy and look very nice. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B.

customer_reviews.title: You may want to read this before buying.
customer_reviews.text: These tables are AWESOME! Really well built. They are NOT solid wood. They are partial board covered with vinyl. That being said, the vinyl must be super thick and very strong. My three year old daughter beats these tables like they owe her money. It's been a year and they're still in flawless condition, which is kind of amazing, considering all they've been through. I was originally a little apprehensive about the vinyl, but it's obviously VERY durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Neuser

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this piece. It's absolutely perfect for my living room. I had this saved in my wish list fore or and when amazon had a lightning deal I knew I had to snatch this. So glad I did because it truly is a gorgeous piece and there's plenty of space on the bottom for storage baskets, but I just fold up a knitted blanket for my cats to lay on. I've had this coffee table for over 6 months now and it has shown zero signs of werlar even after being used day in and day out. Next I'm going to purchase the matching end tables!
customer_reviews.author: heavymetalmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility With This Small Table
customer_reviews.text: I had a ruined table that I had to discard and found this in a quick search online. I have other SONGMICS products, so thought I would give this one a try. It is very sturdy, holding up a Bose 303 speaker, along with some decorative items, and some bins fit perfectly on the shelf below - keeping things off the floor, and stored attractively. The finish is very attractive, and the piece is quite heavy and sturdy, upon assembly. I had no problems with assembly, either. Fit and finish was quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L.

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: I've just furnished an entire apartment on Amazon, and I'm going to give honest reviews. Value doesn't just mean inexpensive. It's a combination of price and quality. I've found that almost every product on Amazon that's affordable gets close to five stars, and that's ridiculous. That's my opening statement from now on because Amazon is out of control. LOVE THIS! It's easy to assemble, sturdy, attractive, and affordable. The true meaning of value. It really has some weight to it as well, which I personally like. I would purchase it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got this product on a lightning deal. I had this product on my wishlist because I have a shelf from the same manufacturer. This coffee table matches my shelf perfectly, and I could not be happier. The table is easy to assemble (much easier than the shelf), and it has held up well for the few months I have had it. The table is sturdy, but it is not super heavy to move for vacuuming. The finish on the table has held up, and I do not have any scratches on it. I would recommend this product. I will be purchasing more products from VASAGLE in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!! High quality, beautiful, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is amazing. Easy to assemble, beautiful color, love the rustic feel, very sturdy and high quality, and best of all great price. It also happens to match our hardwood floor. Overall very happy and will be ordering the matching side table soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: This entire line is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: A for attractiveness, the wood is just lovely. I’ve left sweating cups on this and no bubbling. The wood looks like solid wood. A for ease construction. A for sturdiness. A for quality. I feel like i got more than what I paid for and that is rare. I have the sofa table and 2 stands for the couch. One note, these are smaller pieces. If you vote this helpful I can post model shots from my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia2012

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: This item was very easy to assemble, is extremely attractive, very sturdy, and fit the bill. I recently purchased a four-piece stereo system which turned out to be way larger than I was expecting and which also came with a recommendation not to put the pieces close to each other. In short, I needed something rather large, attractive, and if things change, can easily be used again for another purpose like say, a coffee table/foot stool because I tend to lean to the more pragmatic side of life. I'm extremely pleased with this item - no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: wazntme

customer_reviews.title: This is a top notch line...
customer_reviews.text: A for attractiveness, the wood is just lovely. I’ve left sweating cups on this and no bubbling. The wood looks like solid wood. A for ease construction. A for sturdiness. A for quality. I feel like i got more than what I paid for and that is rare. I have the sofa table and 2 stands for the couch. One note, these are smaller pieces. If you vote this helpful I can post model shots from my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia2012

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged goods and no response
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged table top. I emailed for a possible replacement but never heard back. Very unfortunate considering I've ordered multiple pieces of furniture in this brand and style that did come in proper condition. I still have to give a one star considering the circumstances of product and no reply service.
customer_reviews.author: Fortress

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Study for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this table for 80 bucks. Cant complain. When you build it, be sure to really tighten the bolts, as left loose will result in a wobbly table. For the money you get a nice table thats usable as well. Looks really nice in the living along with some decor. i wouldnt recommend putting heavy items on it as it doesnt seem as study to hold any real weight but eating off it, placing some beers, decorations and similar works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Damaged with defects
customer_reviews.text: The end table arrived with some minor damage to the wood top: chips and scratches. The legs also do not sit flat and some leftover welding that dripped down to the bottom of the legs created an uneven surface to screw in the feet. It looks fine from a distance, and is not worth disassembling to ship back. Seems sturdy enough, I use it to hold a 20 pound printer. Overall it is fine, but I would definitely not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin DKZ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dented, bottom shelf doesn't seem sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this table, but it arrived dented and the bottom shelf doesn't seem sturdy enough for my intended purposes. Now that it's assembled, it's not worth the hassle to send it back. Into the garage it goes.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Fairly priced.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this coffee table. It looks amazing with all of my furniture and doesn’t look clunky. I only have two issues with the table. It’s not very sturdy. I made sure all the screws and everything are as tight as they can be but if you move it around to vacuum you can feel that it doesn’t have much support. The other issue is I have a puppy that kept getting his pad stuck in the grate on the bottom. Who would have thought?
customer_reviews.author: Smashley

customer_reviews.title: Better than we expected!
customer_reviews.text: We are So glad we bought this stand! It is exactly what we were looking for! We had shopped locally and found a couple of things, but they were overpriced and really not what we wanted. Our stand came, It was easy to put together, exactly the right size and Way more sturdy than we had expected! We like it So much, we have ordered another one but with 2 shelves this time for another room and purpose...Highly recommend these stands!! Great Amazon owner/seller!! Thanks So much!!
customer_reviews.author: Nita E.

customer_reviews.title: Multiple damage areas and horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived with 4 screws holding the table top to the frame stripped out in the wood. Not possible to tighten. There was a 1.5" x 1" section of damage with horrible touch up paint on the frame as well. How was that OK to pass the factory quality check? Also this is some kind of composite wood with a terrible laminate on top. It is not wood.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fleming

customer_reviews.title: COFFEE TABLE OF MY DREAMS!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I seriously saw this coffee table and was like AAAOOOOGA! I love love love the rustic industrial style, and for me after seeing this no other table wouldve been good enough. The marbled/weathered wood is what got me in the end. I pondered a few days about whether I should spend $90 on a coffee table then went ahead and got it. It arrived in a couple days, no parts or anything missing, and easy to assemble (according to fiance). It took him about 20 minutes ish. It's beautiful and I absolutely love it. Just get it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. one was perfect, one had shipping damage (Amazon took care of the damage on a single phone call). Ok took me 15 minutes each to assemble, you'll do it in 10. Easy as can be but I'm slow. The metal frame is sturdy, a little more so than I expected. I don't abuse my things so I'll have these for years to come. In the $80 range these coffee tables are a value.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my place!
customer_reviews.text: I have a VASGALE set going, they have these end tables and the coffee table. I ended up just buying the shoe rack / seat and the entryway tree. It's awesome that you can purchase an entire set. Its almost addicting because its affordable, looks great and they have a wide variety. I have my eye on the standalone Coat hanger. Super easy to put these items together, but the wood used is heavy. You can feel the quality. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: WannabeAmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: it meets my needs and the price was right
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not too difficult but most of the screws were difficult to use. It took several tries to get the threads to catch in the metal parts, maybe because of paint on the screws or maybe the threads in the metal parts had spurs on them. No washers or nuts, so that made assembly faster but I am not sure the screws won't work loose at some point.
customer_reviews.author: austinite

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged. Still gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Still gorgeous - we love how it looks. It is too much of a hassle to return so we will deal with the damage. The metal shelf is dented in multiple locations and the top of the table was separated from the metal trim. All the screws were ripped out of it and stripped the wood. After some creative work around we were able to assemble it without many problems. Will be using wood glue soon to keep it together. Disappointing. But it matches our decor perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gassler

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table!! It was a little smaller than I expected and if you don’t use coasters it will probably bubble BUT it looks incredible for the price!! I wanted my room to look light so I had my husband spray paint the bottom and it came out perfect!! Super happy
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not a serious piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This might be good for a dorm or small apartment or if you are just starting out. But it’s not a serious piece of furniture. Smaller than I thought it would be. If you’re into the minimalist look than go for it. You’re not going to Impress anybody with it. I wish I hadn’t bought it. I ordered the coffee table as well but too late to cancel.
customer_reviews.author: TimTime

customer_reviews.title: Best looking for this price point - nice metal and wood
customer_reviews.text: Love the finish and matches other products in the Songmics Vintage line. Easy to build. I liked the mesh bottom b/c I am using it to hold all my TV / Media as an 'entertainment center' so having the ability to vent heat underneath it is huge. Looks good in a room where you want dark tones. The wood looks kind of fake but I kind of don't care. My man cave is the perfect place for it. Only thing I don't like is the cheap looking white plastic floor protectors. I'll probably either remove them or just spray paint them black. Otherwise a solid choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ed U. Kaytor

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It is super cute, and took me less than 15 minutes to assemble. It comes with everything you needing, even the tool to tighten the bolts. It is sturdy too. This table is the perfect blend of farmhouse and modern style in my opinion. It was on sale when I bought it and was quite the steal! I also ordered the matching coffee table and can’t wait for it to arrive!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Secured in package for shipping—great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, with the rustic color and storage tray to go underneath. 4 stars because of sturdiness of legs. They give you 4 screws to attach the legs to the side of the frame, and I think they should have given a spacer or washer to improve sturdiness and overall stability, but, I bought the whole set together, minus the side tables, and I’m very happy overall. I have a normal size /m GShepherd laying aside from the table, just for size references. It’ll hold enough for you to be happy with a regular coffee table. Better quality than IKEA, for the same price. It also came very secure in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: KWB

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t manufactured properly, but they attempted to remedy
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend if you buy this product to verify that the pre-drilled threaded holes are manufactured properly. Once I started attaching the legs of the table, one of them wasn’t fabricated properly. As a result, I had to take the whole thing apart, box it back up, and return it. UPDATE: The company reached out and apologized for the problem and attempted to remedy the problem. Their strive for customer satisfaction was much higher than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: R Richmond

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My sofa table was packaged well and I was happy to see that there was no damage as some reported in their reviews. I am not the best when it comes to assembly, but this was easy to put together, once I figured out how to position the legs. It is both sturdy and beautiful! I'm going to order another one☺Low cost, high quality table.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a TV stand and it is great. It’s a laminated faux wood top but the lamination is done really well and you almost forget it’s not real wood. The top is a lot heavier than most laminated pieces (in a good way). Once it’s put together it’s very sturdy. It’s also fairly deep so you can fit a lot of stuff on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to match with the VASAGLE glass topped coffee table. By comparison, this was a breeze to assemble - one person, less than five minutes. I've placed a large rattan basket filled with lap blankets on the bottom shelf & have enjoyed having a sturdy place to set my morning cup of coffee. Good value for the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble. Got this for my small office space. I was about to assemble this in about 10-15 minutes, by myself. The 'hardest' step was putting the base/bottom part on...Trying to hold the grate level and get screws in! But still a fairly easy task. I loved that they had the parts in small plastic (labeled) bags. I've put together a lot of furniture in my past that was inside cardboard sectioned packaging, and opening said cardboard packaging, would rip or remove what part was printed on it! You will need a screwdriver and needle nose plyers. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan of the wood stain on the other console table similar to this one so I kept looking and saw this one. I was skeptical to buy it at first because there were no reviews, however I am very happy I purchased it any way. I use it in my dining room for my small wine rack and wine bottles. I would say the bottom shelf should definitely be used for lighter things unless you don't mind it bending a bit with more weight. Very easy to assemble. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: mtini

customer_reviews.title: The tiniest side table in all the land...
customer_reviews.text: I just looked at the good reviews and didn’t pay attention to dimensions. Wish I had. These side tables are so small they look silly next to our couch. Bought them for temporary housing situation while our furniture is in our house we are selling, but these things are going bye-bye as soon as we move into our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and size. Perfect for laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my laundry room, great fit and is the perfect look. Fit two laundry hampers underneath and supplies are neatly kept on top. It was the perfect fit and much nicer that the utility cabinets usually found in laundry/kitchen sections. Packaging protected the piece and it was relatively easy to assemble. All parts were included and my son and I put it together in hardly any time at all. Easy to clean and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: (One leg peg was the wrong size!) CORRECTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update!!! This is what we originally wrote about this table (It was a dream to put together UNTIL we put on the leg pegs. We did 3 and the 4th one wouldn’t screw in because it was smaller than the other 3. BUT now!!! We were impressed with with customer service that sent us the correct foot peg immediately after my call to them. This table has been great. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Debi G

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Great quality for the price. Don’t change Vasagle.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. I bought a Vasagle Desk, then got one of these tables as a matching night stand after how pleased I was with the desk. Well, I just ordered another table to match. It’s just simple, easy to put together, and a nice quality look for a great price. What more could I ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Table is great! Customer service is non-existant
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 tables and one had holes drilled incorrectly on 2 metal legs. I emailed customer service as instructed asking for new legs and was totally ignored. After a few days I ordered a third table to get the 2 new legs then returned the remaining table with the wrong legs. It was a hassle but I really like the tables!
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feel solid
customer_reviews.text: This version has the larger metal legs and is very solid. The laminate over particle board for the table top is very good looking and really looks like stained wood from 3 ft away. It was very easy to assemble and included the Allen wrench (which was the only tool required). All of the parts were well packaged and look like they were well made. All the metal was straight.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse rustic table
customer_reviews.text: My living room and dinning area are together so i don’t have an entry way area separate from those 2 so I thought setting this table behind the couch would make it look a little more put together and I was right the entry table is super cute long enough for 4 thing to go on top and the bottom shelves gives it the pop it needs if you love to decorate like I do this is totally for you.. easy to assemble and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Yohena

customer_reviews.title: Great side table
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the old style wood with the metal. I currently have the table between two chaise lounges. Its great for a few drinks and/or a book or two. Also, has a storage below for more reading material or whatever you like Super easy to assemble. I took me less than 10 minutes. Very happy with the purhcase
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely gorgeous. I have the hexagon shaped one already but needed something that would fit with our sectional so I decided to get this one also. Unfortunately it did come damaged and I will be needing to exchange this for a new one. Other than the product being easily damaged, I would order again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not worth the price point
customer_reviews.text: It’s not all the sturdy and has chipped wood. It’s not a terrible product but I think should have a lower price point considering the issues I’ve listed. It looks nice aside from those two issues. It wasn’t a complete wast of money just wish it would have been a little less expensive considering. The product game on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing to complain about. It's sturdy, it was super easy to assemble (didn't even look at the little instruction pamphlet that came with it), everything was machined well and fits properly, it has a nice industrial appearance, and it's the perfect height to use as a nightstand for a platform bed. It feels like something that should have cost twice as much. I'll probably be buying another... and also some other matching furniture pieces from this company.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smitts

customer_reviews.title: Great company with simple furniture!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for an entryway! Very easy to assemble with no bells and whistles. The table came well packaged, early, and had clear instructions with no factory smell. The grated bottom is useful for everyday shoe storage. Pretty sturdy too! Very pleased with VASAGLE products.
customer_reviews.author: BlueChild

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and stunning look!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product! I purchased this item as I was looking to replace a big bulky wooden one that I have had for years. I wanted something simple and loved the industrial style of this one. I don’t think the pictures quite do the beauty of it justice. It looks and feels very high quality in person. The installation was the easiest I have ever had for any type of furniture. It is also sturdier than any bulky wooden (likely plywood) one that I would have purchased for a similar price at a big box store. It looks great, functions great, and is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cale B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the console table for an extra workspace in my home office. I'm very pleased with the look, easy-to-assemble pieces, and sturdiness of the table. For the price, you can't go wrong. It came in good condition with no scratches and all pieces/hardware needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Well done...
customer_reviews.text: Given the price point and nature of VASAGLE furniture I was very impressed by the packing, materials, construction and ease of assembly of this coffee table. Having assembled my share of cheap furniture in the past this piece was impressive for furniture designed to be shipped direct to a consumer for assembly. Liked it so much I bought a matching end table and will probably add more pieces over time. Kudos.
customer_reviews.author: MPITA

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy As An Ox.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is extremely sturdy once I slapped it all together. It easily holds my 140 pounds if I sit on it and has zero wobble. The corners are fairly sharp however so it might not fair so well in a home that has small children or clumsy adults. It looks nice and I've come to like the look of so much I've purchased a few other items of the same brand and color and all are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table! The top had a few dents in it upon arrival, but they are small and we hardly notice them. The table itself is gorgeous and sleek and fits well in our smaller (1-bedroom apt.) living room. I am so happy with this product that I am looking at the other furniture pieces to match!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table, the wood looks genuine (in my opinion) and it was so easy to set up. It’s also very light and easy to move around for vacuuming or whatever. I also purchased a table protector for it which is why in the photo the surface looks shiny, I Just wanted to show how it looks in a smaller living room.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lynn Crammer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our living room!
customer_reviews.text: I love this end table because it matches my coffee table perfectly. It took me only 10mins to put together. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. The item was in its own company box plus amazon box for extra protection, so nothing came damaged. I do wish it was a little taller but that has nothing to do with the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: cheers

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and a well made item with no hassles.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for our two guinea pigs cage to sit on. It's more than up to the job and it is saving my back too. It's a great price, it arrived fast and was solidly packed. A positive purchase from a high class seller. Many Thanks for a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pierson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT  Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wow .... 5 star plus. Great product for a sturdy end table. Just as described but better. Very sturdy metal legs. Solid and great looking wood top shelf. Looks great. Super easy to put together, it only took about 10 mins and all the tools were included. All that for a great price. I am going to buy another one! ....p.s. I don’t usually write reviews but this product deserves a review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table that was very easy to put together. It seems fairly sturdy, though it probably would have been better if I had used Loctite on the screws. Matches my furniture quite well as it has a somewhat industrial look. Shipping was very fast considering the circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Area417

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged against damage. We had one corner slightly rubbed which was easily fixed. Over all we like it some of our grandkids have sat on it. You don't have to worry about breakage. We put assorted things on the shelf. Overall value for the money average.
customer_reviews.author: Hhrjr

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL! I love it! Perfect entryway table!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece!! Perfect table for my entryway 💕. Very easy to put together. Very nice quality for tge price. I wish I could add a photo but for some reason I no longer see that option.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Marie Smith

customer_reviews.title: looks fancy
customer_reviews.text: this looks pretty upscale for the price and materials. installed it pretty quickly, you do not need any additional tools from what comes with the package. love the bottom storage shelf to put our blankets on. very light so i can easily move it when i need room to work out.
customer_reviews.author: jawabiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, no issues whatsoever. The ONLY thing I'll say negative is that since there are no cross braces on the legs, the whole structure is a TINY bit wobbly, so just don't overload it. But besides that, GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my reading corner
customer_reviews.text: I am slowly replacing my furniture. Previously had a huge sectional and I am downgrading to smaller pieces. I love this little table. It is sturdy and holds what I need without overcrowding. Perfect size and very sturdy. My son put it together in under 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: weeteach

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect for our needs--we have a 29 gallon hermit crab aquarium on the top shelf and a 10 gallon toad aquarium on the bottom shelf! (Note that neither aquarium is filled with water, so I can not verify if that would be suitable.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and great TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: Having to move 3 times in a year, I just decided to start over...This table is GREAT! I am 112 lbs. gal and I assembled in 30 minutes. Hardest part was attaching lower shelf. I put top upside down on floor and stacked some boxes (and a bucket) to serve as a temporary support to lower shelf as I tightened screws. Do NOT tighten all the way until every screw is fitted in, then do the final tightening. Very worth the cost and effort. Little taller than I imagined, still a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Vasagle is great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought multiple products from VASAGLE and all of them have been easy to assemble and sturdy. So great for the low price! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dani K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble Console Sofa Table
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived sooner that expected. Good quality and easy to assemble. I'm a 72 year old female and it took me 35 minutes from the time box was opened until fully assembled. It came with the screwdriver. All holes matched! Color of wood was a good match for my other tables.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria N.

customer_reviews.title: Sell yo babies, maybe your wife.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee table. I love it, however I should have reconsidered my kids before purchasing this. I have two with matching scars from smashing into the corner and having to go to the er for stitches... lesson learned. Trade your kids in if you want sharp Furniture. Maybe in 18 years I’ll actually be able to use this.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to house my growing 3D printed collection. Bottom was big enough to either of my printers. I'm tempted to enclose the bottom part in glass to make a case for my Prusa. Price was great, seller was great, table is great. A+.
customer_reviews.author: D J P

product_meta.title: VASAGLE Industrial End Side Table, 2-Tier Nightstand with Storage Shelf, Sturdy and Easy Assembly, Wood Look Accent Furniture with Metal Frame , 17.7"L x 17.7"W x 21.7"H, Rustic Brown
product_meta.description: VASAGLE represents a combination of functionality, durability and stylish vintage designs. If you want to give your rooms an individual touch and an antique aesthetic, our industrial furniture series can achieve impressive effects. Vintage Side Table with Iron Elements Thanks to the matte-black iron frame, this end table is not only a real enrichment for the lovers of romantic rustic furniture, but it’s also a unique addition for the industrial style fans who want to add more to their home. Something behind the Facade A piece of furniture doesn’t benefit from even the most beautiful appearance if it lacks functionality. Therefore, our side table has a robust metal shelf for magazines or books, which can hold up to 33 lbs. In addition, the furniture can be used in a wide variety of places as the small cube shape cuts a fine figure as a bedside table in the bedroom or as a coffee table in the living room. Complete your interior with vintage-style furniture from VASAGLE ! Specifications: - Colour: Rustic Brown - Material: Particleboard, Iron Frame - Product Size: 17. 7''L x 17. 7''W x 21. 6''H - Weight: 13. 2 lb (6 kg) - Load Capacity of Table top: 44 lb (20 kg) - Load Capacity of Metal Shelf: 33 lb (15 kg) Package Contents: - 1 x Side Table - 1 x Instructions - 1 x Allen Key
feature_bullets: Sturdy & durable: Made of angle iron, the structure is solid and stable; coated with veneer, the Top surface is waterproof and wear- resistant; Simple yet practical
Versatile uses: 2-tiered shelves provide more display space and storage; top surface is a perfect spot for your lamp or family photos while the lower is ideal for books and magazines
Protective feet: the feet can prevent scratches on the floor; can be adjusted slightly in the case of uneven floors, increase the stability
Classic appearance: Vintage chic with Simple construction to create an attractive look and feel; fits well with your personal taste and interior décor
Product Size: 17. 7”L x 17. 7”W x 21. 6”H, fits in an entryway, next to sofa; especially in small places, handy Furniture

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars983 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
